text: The Medal of Honor Monument, also known as the Oregon Medal of Honor Roll, is a granite obelisk commemorating Oregon's Medal of Honor recipients, installed outside the Oregon Department of Veterans' Affairs Building in Salem, Oregon, United States. Cut from a step leading to the Oregon State Capitol, the memorial is a replica of the state's monument in the Medal of Honor Grove Freedom Foundation at Valley Forge, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:Granite sculptures in Oregon Category:Medal of Honor Category:Monuments and memorials in Salem, Oregon Category:Outdoor sculptures in Salem, Oregon
title: Medal of Honor Monument
